price: Dhugumatti, kana dura isatti kafaranii turan. Iddoo fagoo ta’e irraa (tilmaamaan) haasawa darbatu.
arabic: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqad kafarū bihi min qablu wayaqdhifūna bil-ghaybi min makānin baʿīdin
